rules_text:
When this creature enters, draw three cards, then discard two cards.
{1}, Discard this card, return a land you control to its owner’s hand: Create a tapped Island token.
notes:
Strictly worse Thirst for {Discovery, Meaning, Knowledge}. I’m fine with that.

Probably buff (if blue needs it). Could be as big as 3/4 (Is that too good? Compare Mulldrifter)
